Name: The Arena Guy
About the game: The Arena Guy is a tough challenge of your skills. Fight on the arena, upgrade weapons and improve your hero and let's see how far will you go! An endless brutal fights with hard rock soundtrack. What could be better? INFINITE GAMEPLAY It only depends on your skills and chosen strategy how far will you proceed. TONS OF UPGRADES A lot of ways to upgrade your weapons and your hero. DEADLY WEAPONS Buy more toys of destruction with earned money. EVEN MORE DEADLY BOSSES Sorry, but they will tear you apart in seconds. BRUTAL FIGHTS Shoot your enemies into bloody pieces with realistic physics model. HARD ROCK ARENA Dozen of hard rock melodies to make your mind fast and furious. YOUR OWN BASE Explore your safe place between battles to find its all secrets. FANCY GRAPHICS A perfect visual style to concentrate on gameplay. DETAILED STATISTICS Every action matters. Keep track of all your stats. Good luck and have fun!
